title: Farewell ceremony held for Secretary Parliamentary Affairs Humaira Ahmed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 09 (APP):The Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs on Wednesday hosted a farewell ceremony in honour of Federal Secretary Humaira Ahmed on the occasion of her retirement.
Federal Minister for Parliamentary Affairs Dr. Tariq Fazal Chaudhry attended the event and presented a special shield and bouquet to the outgoing secretary, extending his best wishes for her future endeavors.
Speaking at the ceremony, Dr. Tariq Fazal Chaudhry lauded Humaira Ahmed’s dedication and professionalism, particularly highlighting her vital role during the recent budget session and other key parliamentary engagements.
He commended her service and noted that committed bureaucrats like her are instrumental in driving positive change within the system.
All officers of the Ministry paid tribute to the retiring Secretary, and a cake-cutting ceremony was also held to mark the occasion.
In her remarks, Humaira Ahmed expressed gratitude to the Minister and her colleagues for organising the farewell. She described her working relationship with Dr. Tariq Fazal Chaudhry as highly positive and appreciated the collective support of the Ministry’s team throughout her tenure.
